name: com.danliukuri.rbv
description:
Raymarched Bounding Volumes is the core package from the RBV family built for raymarching in Unity, aimed at effective visualization and manipulation of 3D objects and their combinations.

The name Raymarched Bounding Volumes comes from the idea of using bounding volumes to define the rendering space for raymarching, which has been proven to be more effective than rendering in the entire screen space (refer to https://github.com/danliukuri/RaymarchingRenderingSpacePerformanceTesting).

samples.description: The simple demonstration of the RBV capabilities, represents a rather unconventional usage of the package.
